mapper.insert: insert into customer_service(cs_title, cs_content, cs_writer, cs_category, temporary) values (#{csTitle}, #{csContent}, #{csWriter}, #{csCategory}, #{temporary})
mapper.update: update customer_service set cs_view= cs_view + 1 where cs_id =#{csId}
mapper.select: select * from customer_service WHERE cs_reply IS NULL

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() over(ORDER BY cs_id) AS paged_cs_id, cs_id, cs_category, cs_writer, cs_title, cs_date FROM customer_service cs WHERE cs_reply IS NULL) cs2 WHERE cs2.paged_cs_id BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT count(*) FROM customer_service WHERE cs_reply IS NULL
select * from ( select ROW_NUMBER() over(order by cs_id desc)as cs_no, cs.* from customer_service cs where cs.cs_category=#{category1}) cs2 where cs2.cs_no between #{start} and #{end}
select count(*) from customer_service cs where cs.temporary =1
select count(*) from customer_service where cs_category=#{category1}
select count(*) from customer_service where cs_title like concat('%', #{search1}, '%')

select * from ( select ROW_NUMBER() over(order by cs_id desc) as cs_no, cs.* from customer_service cs where cs.cs_title like concat('%', #{search1}, '%')) cs2 where cs2.cs_no between #{start} and #{end}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() over(ORDER BY cs_id) AS paged_cs_id, cs_id, cs_category, cs_writer, cs_title, cs_date FROM customer_service cs WHERE temporary = 1) cs2 WHERE cs2.paged_cs_id BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
